Text at the beginning reads:
En 2005 los cientificos descubrieron un planeta distante con un clima casi identico al de la tierra

En 2006 la nasa construyo un aparato de transmision cinco veces mas potente que los existentes hasta la fecha, dando comienzo a un programa para contactar con dicho planeta

Lo llamaron "proyecto beacon"

Google translate says it means:

In 2005, scientists discovered a distant planet with a climate almost identical to that of the earth.

In 2006, NASA built a transmission apparatus five times more powerful than exists to date, kicking off a program to contact the planet

They called it "Project Beacon"
Picture is pretty good, audio is quite horrible, movies itself was one of the worst I've ever seen.
